reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, comfortable, and stretchy, offering great value for money.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!!
items.body: This dress was more than expected. It was very beautiful and just what I needed for the length I was going with. It has enough stretch in it. I went down a size in mines and it fit great. I would recommend me this dress any day!!! Read more
items.author: Santana Berry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous
items.body: Comfortable, great fit, no adjustments required, sequins secure, beautiful Read more
items.author: Effie W. Jefferson

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful dirty dress
items.body: This dress clearly was worn by someone who was short in statue...therefore the dress dragged the ground. This dress is brown on the bottom, all the way around. I mean the hem of the dress is filthy. I know someone had to see this dirty a$$ dress...are you serious. A very dissatisfied customer...no stars and a thumbs down Read more
items.author: ANGELIA PALMER

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute dress, runs big, order a smaller size than what you normally wear.
items.body: Thanks for such a cute dress!! Made me look just like â€œGingerâ€ for Halloween ðŸŽƒ Read more
items.author: Tyra Dramm

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress in all colors except for pink
items.body: I needed a dress for a formal I was attending. After looking in the stores and not finding anything that met my needs (comfort, flattering, reasonable and not needing to be altered for the most part), I decided to give Amazon a try at finding a dress for myself. I ordered the pink, black and purple in my size and decided to see which I liked the best. I was hoping to avoid the black only because I wanted a bit of color. The pink was my ideal choice, but the one they sent had a horrible poorly sewn seam so I returned it for another pink. This one also had a poorly sewn seam! That left me with the purple and black to choose from. Both are beautiful - very rich and not cheap-looking. Like anything black, it hides any body imperfections. With that said, I am quite amazed at the quality of the dress! it wasn't shabby. Best yet, it can be hand washed AND it's so comfortable! It hugs you just right, yet allows you to breathe. BTW, I'm about 5'6" and wore 2 1/2 inch shoes. No need to alter the length. You could actually get away with a lower heel as well - perhaps even almost a flat if you want the dress to come right to the floor. Read more
items.author: Gwen P.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Silver Sparkles
items.body: This dress was so nice. It fit perfectly, and I loved how stretchy the fabric is, but I had issues zipping it up and sequins keep coming off. For the price, itâ€™s great, but know in advance, youâ€™ll be loosing sequinsâ€¦everywhere! Read more
items.author: Carla Bianco Biagini

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: Loved how this dress fit! Comfortable, stretchy material. After 2 dresses arrived that I didn't like after trying them on, I ordered this one and love it! It didnt quite hit the floor, but almost. I'm 5 ft 10 inches tall so it may touch the floor on a shorter person, but it was a sneaker ball gala so at least my sneakers were a little visible ðŸ˜Š Read more
items.author: Sherita Copeland

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shiny and Flashy
items.body: this is Lovely and it stretches! I did keep the XL because I liked the length, but I could put it on without unzipping the zipper. I usually do wear an XL but I did not need to wear any type of spandex item to "hold me in". Great price for a Fancy-Shiny dress and a JESSICA RABBIT costume. Read more
items.author: Annell M.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Sleeveless Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Sleeveless Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray, Blue, Dark Pink, Multicolor, Rose, Light Green, Black, Camel, Champagne, Red, Silver, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
